description: Retrieves the report including the report ID, status, time details, and the insights with recommendations. The report status can be RUNNING, SUCCEEDED, or FAILED. The insights include the description and recommendation fields.

parameters.name: ServiceType
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services service for which Performance Insights will return metrics. Valid value is RDS.

parameters.name: Identifier
parameters.description: An immutable identifier for a data source that is unique for an Amazon Web Services Region. Performance Insights gathers metrics from this data source. In the console, the identifier is shown as ResourceID. When you call DescribeDBInstances, the identifier is returned as DbiResourceId. To use a DB instance as a data source, specify its DbiResourceId value. For example, specify db-ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTU1VW2X.

parameters.name: AnalysisReportId
parameters.description: A unique identifier of the created analysis report. For example, report-12345678901234567

nested_items.name: AnalysisReport
nested_items.description: The summary of the performance analysis report created for a time period.

nested_items.name: AnalysisReportId
nested_items.description: The name of the analysis report.

nested_items.name: Identifier
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the analysis report.

nested_items.name: ServiceType
nested_items.description: List the tags for the Amazon Web Services service for which Performance Insights returns metrics. Valid values are as follows:
RDS.
DOCDB.

nested_items.name: CreateTime
nested_items.description: The time you created the analysis report.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The analysis start time in the report.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The analysis end time in the report.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the created analysis report.

nested_items.name: Insights
nested_items.description: The list of identified insights in the analysis report.

nested_items.name: InsightId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the insight. For example, insight-12345678901234567.

nested_items.name: InsightType
nested_items.description: The type of insight. For example, HighDBLoad, HighCPU, or DominatingSQLs.

nested_items.name: Context
nested_items.description: Indicates if the insight is causal or correlated insight.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the insight. For example, 2018-10-30T00:00:00Z.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The end time of the insight. For example, 2018-10-30T00:00:00Z.

nested_items.name: Severity
nested_items.description: The severity of the insight. The values are: Low, Medium, or High.

nested_items.name: SupportingInsights
nested_items.description: List of supporting insights that provide additional factors for the insight.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: Description of the insight. For example: A high severity Insight found between 02:00 to 02:30, where there was an unusually high DB load 600x above baseline. Likely performance impact.

nested_items.name: Recommendations
nested_items.description: List of recommendations for the insight. For example, Investigate the following SQLs that contributed to 100% of the total DBLoad during that time period: sql-id.

nested_items.name: RecommendationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the recommendation.

nested_items.name: RecommendationDescription
nested_items.description: The recommendation details to help resolve the performance issue. For example, Investigate the following SQLs that contributed to 100% of the total DBLoad during that time period: sql-id.

nested_items.name: InsightData
nested_items.description: List of data objects containing metrics and references from the time range while generating the insight.

nested_items.name: PerformanceInsightsMetric
nested_items.description: This field determines the Performance Insights metric to render for the insight. The name field refers to a Performance Insights metric.

nested_items.name: Metric
nested_items.description: The Performance Insights metric.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The Performance Insights metric name.

nested_items.name: Dimensions
nested_items.description: A dimension map that contains the dimensions for this partition.
(string) ---
(string) ---
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the metric. For example, 9 for db.load.avg.

nested_items.name: BaselineData
nested_items.description: Metric names and values from the timeframe used as baseline to generate the insight.

nested_items.name: PerformanceInsightsMetric
nested_items.description: This field determines the Performance Insights metric to render for the insight. The name field refers to a Performance Insights metric.

nested_items.name: Metric
nested_items.description: The Performance Insights metric.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The Performance Insights metric name.

nested_items.name: Dimensions
nested_items.description: A dimension map that contains the dimensions for this partition.
(string) ---
(string) ---
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the metric. For example, 9 for db.load.avg.
